meta.description: Potential Firefox extension to intercept Ctrl+Shift+C, block opening developer tools, and copy the selection to the clipboard.
meta.longDescription:
it comes with several limitations:
- doesn't work on new-tab page
- doesn't work if the focus isn't on page content
  - e.g. ctrl+shift+c from URL bar still brings up dev console, incorrectly.

the proper fix to disabling Ctrl+Shift+C seems to require compiling Firefox from source, as of their Quantum project post-2019.
meta.name: ctrl-shift-c-should-copy-0-unstable-2023-03-03

meta.description: Screen locker for Wayland -- fork with background plugin support
meta.longDescription:
This is a fork of swaylock, a screen locking utility for Wayland compositors.
With swaylock-plugin, you can for your lockscreen background display the
animated output from any wallpaper program that implements the
wlr-layer-shell-unstable-v1 protocol.

N.B.: it's necessary to install /etc/pam.d/swaylock-plugin without which
swaylock-plugin will never unlock your session.
meta.name: swaylock-plugin-1.6-unstable-2024-02-21

meta.description: On-screen keyboard for wlroots optimized for one finger input

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

meta.longDescription:
wvkbd-mk is optimized for single finger input and is quite a different
from other keyboards. It uses a 3 by 3 grid for the main input. Keys are
pressed by tapping or swiping the grid.

N.B.: invoke as `wvkbd-anihortes --motion-keys` or else it behaves like
stock `wvkbd` with a funny layout.
meta.name: wvkbd-mk-unstable-2024-01-01
